quest.name: The Hour of Reckoning
journal: The time has come for Lord Hien to return to Doma.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Let's go. Everyone is waiting for us back at the House of the Fierce!

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Heh heh...I wonder what Yugiri will have to say when we tell her of our adventures?

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Right, then. To the House of the Fierce. With me, my friends!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Err, remind me─what part of Yanxia is this again?

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Ahh...this air that fills my breast, these sounds which resound in my ears. I am home.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: I have not used this road before, but... Ah. I recognize this place.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: The House of the Fierce should lie somewhere to the south. I will go on ahead and inform the sentries of our master's return.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Huh, I didn't realize there was another entrance.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Here we are! I wonder if they all are gathered inside, waiting...perhaps expecting a speech or some such...

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Well! No matter! I shall have to do what I shall have to do!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: So...have we got a plan? Tell me someone's got a plan.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Alphinaud has been hard at work devising our strategy to seize Doma Castle. I'm sure he will be happy to share the details with you all shortly.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: No time to soak it in. We have work to do.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Not that I doubted you for a moment, but I am relieved to see him returned.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: All is in place. We need but commit to action and see it through to the end.

dialogue.name: YAGORO
dialogue.text: Lord Hien has returned! Lord Hien has returned! And together we will drive the imperials out of Doma once and for all!

dialogue.name: HANAME
dialogue.text: I knew Lord Hien only by name and reputation until today. There is no denying that he has a presence...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Once more, welcome back. It is good to see you again, Forename.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ah, yes. There is another recent development we neglected to share with you.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Alisaie and I have been hard at work attempting to restore the aetheryte here to its former glory...and I am pleased to inform you that we succeeded!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Suffice it to say, it should prove a boon for travel─well, for those replete with anima like you, at least...
